actions.committee: House Committee on District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on District of Columbia.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on District of Columbia
actions.text: Clean Bill, H.R. 5622 Reported in Lieu.

official_title: To authorize an additional Federal payment to the District of Columbia for fiscal year 1993 for youth and anti-crime initiatives in the District of Columbia.
subjects: Federal aid to law enforcement agencies

summary.text: Amends the District of Columbia Self-Government and Governmental Reorganization Act to authorize appropriations for the District of Columbia for FY 1993 for youth and anti-crime initiatives.

titles.title: To authorize an additional Federal payment to the District of Columbia for fiscal year 1993 for youth and anti-crime initiatives in the District of Columbia.
